name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OpenHome.ie - your helper on Daft.ie and MyHome.ie

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buying a home in Ireland? Get a block of insights on the popular property websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension conveniently embeds a block with additional information directly on the ad page of Daft.ie and MyHome.ie websites to help you buy your future home.

üöÄ Features:
  ‚≠êÔ∏è A map with recent deals in the area to help you assess the value of your future home.
  ‚≠êÔ∏è The sales history of the advertised house.
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Information on the prosperity of the area and its surroundings (the so-called "Deprivation Index").
  ‚≠êÔ∏è Access to the BER certificate with just one click.

OpenHome.ie extension tells you what property websites don't.
